name: Jerdon HL65BZ 5X Halo Lighted Wall Mount Mirror in Bronze

reviews.name: Jerdon 8" 2-Sided Swivel Halo-Lighted Wall Mount Mirror with 5x Magnification, 14" Extension, Bronze
reviews.reviewText:
The bronze color is definitely dark but not black. The glass is very clear. I have seen some makes that are distorted. I enjoy the length of the extendible swing arm. I don't have to lean in as much as with the stand model that I had prior to this purchase. The bulb is also replaceable.
As for the 5x magnification, it is exactly what I was looking for. A greater magnification requires that you get very close to mirror to focus. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.
reviews.title: Well made

reviews.name: Jerdon 8" 2-Sided Swivel Halo-Lighted Wall Mount Mirror with 5x Magnification, 14" Extension, Bronze
reviews.reviewText: This lighted, wall-mount mirror is superb! The color is fantastic. It is easy to mount on the wall. The light is great. The two magnification sides of the mirror is awesome. I ordered this because it was $60 cheaper than other stores. The quality is really good. I strongly recommend this mirror.
reviews.title: Outstanding Lighted Wall-Mount Mirror

reviews.name: Jerdon 8" 2-Sided Swivel Halo-Lighted Wall Mount Mirror with 5x Magnification, 14" Extension, Bronze
reviews.reviewText: I bought this magnifying mirror for my tall daughter so it could be hung at her height on the wall. The mirror is just the right magnification and the light is flattering for the face. The bronze metal matches the rest of the bathroom hardware and it is all quite sturdy. Walmart's price was quite a bit lower than this same item elsewhere. My daughter loves it!
reviews.title: Perfect mirror for renovated bathroom

reviews.name: Jerdon 8" 2-Sided Swivel Halo-Lighted Wall Mount Mirror with 5x Magnification, 14" Extension, Bronze
reviews.reviewText: Quality built product that was in the Bellagio Hotel and Resort we stayed at. My wife loved the unit at the hotel so I looked for the manufacturers tag and ordered the unit when we got home. Item at the resort was a hardwire unit so I was expecting a chore to install. I was relieved when it was delivered and saw it with a spiral wound cord. Easy to install and a nice accent to a bathroom for you and guests to enjoy.
reviews.title: Corded mirror, nice glam accessory for the ladies

reviews.name: Jerdon 8" 2-Sided Swivel Halo-Lighted Wall Mount Mirror with 5x Magnification, 14" Extension, Bronze
reviews.reviewText: Bellagio hotel and casino had these in the fancy resort rooms and my wife loved it. Flipped it to get manufacturer and model number. You delivered a nice memory that she can use daily.
reviews.title: Las Vegas style pamper
